titleStmt.title: Adam out of Eden or, an abstract of divers excellent experiments touching the advancement of husbandry. Shewing, among very many other things, an aprovement of ground by rabbiss [sic],from 200 l. annual rent, to 2000 l. yearly profit, all charges deducted. / By Ad. Speed. Gent.
titleStmt.author: Speed, Adolphus, fl. 1652-1659.

titleStmt.title: Adam out of Eden or, an abstract of divers excellent experiments touching the advancement of husbandry. Shewing, among very many other things, an aprovement of ground by rabbiss [sic],from 200 l. annual rent, to 2000 l. yearly profit, all charges deducted. / By Ad. Speed. Gent.
titleStmt.author: Speed, Adolphus, fl. 1652-1659.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Henry Brome, at the Gun in Ivy-lane,

notesStmt.note: The last leaf bears vertical half-title: Speeds husbandry.
With three advertisement leaves immediately following text.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Octob:"; the 9 in the imprint date is crossed out and replaced with an "8".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
